subject: Work with the best – Join Magna Automotive India Private Limited as Electronics Hardware Engineer
body:
Do Not forward this mail, it contains links which allow direct login to your Shine account.
Emailer
Dear Candidate,

Recruiter from Magna Automotive India Private Limited is actively hiring for Electronics Hardware Engineer and your profile seems to be a good match.

Role: Electronics Hardware Engineer Experience required: 3-10 yrs Annual CTC: 2-5 LPA

Be sure to update the latest details below to apply for the job.
Total Work Experience in Years*
Current Annual Salary in Lacs*
Expected Annual Salary in Lacs*

How would you describe your current job search?*

Are you Currently Working?*
Current Designation*
Current Company*
Start Date in Current Company*
Notice Period*

*Your Shine profile will be updated with the above details.

Best Regards,
Team Shine

Please add alert@shine.com to your Address Book or Safe List to prevent future Shine Updates from being classified as Junk/Bulk Mail.Security Alert- In case you receive a suspicious mail from anyone claiming to be a client of Shine.com, asking for your personal information or money by pretending to offer you a job please do not respond to such mails and bring it to the immediate notice of Shine.com by writing to us at contactus@shine.com.
Unsubscribe

 

Click here to unsubscribe

subject: You may need this
body:
There are so many things that keep us going every day. Sometimes, it's the big things like our goals, plans or ambitions. Other times, it’s a small gesture, a small win, or just memories. And sometimes, it’s just a message waiting in your inbox. Tap to check it out, and see what might just keep you going today!

Click here to unsubscribe - unsubscribe here.
